quotes.quote: The visionary denies the truth to himself, the liar only to others.
To be a visionary, all you have to do is make decisions based off of your eyes instead of your ears and your memory.
A person who sees a problem is a human being; a person who finds a solution is visionary; and the person who goes out and does something about it is an entrepreneur.
Someone who dreams cannot be forced to stopâ€”there are no limitations to dreams, because we do not own dreams, dreams are from God.
Be a visionary, focused upon your ability to create your desires within your reality.
Visionaries not only believe that the impossible can be done, but that it must be done.
The visionary is the only realist.

Being a visionary is a new profession, but it is really just a variant on fortunetelling, which may be the world's oldest. And its marketing appeal is similar - people will pay for reassurance about the unknown.
Visionary minds are in demand to bear us into the dawn of the deep digital era.
Visionary people face the same problems everyone else faces; but rather than get paralyzed by their problems, visionaries immediately commit themselves to finding a solution.
Visionary people are visionary partly because of the very great many things they don't see.
The more visionary the idea, the more people it leaves behind.

The visionary is the one who brings his or her voice into the world and who refuses to edit, rehearse, perform, or hide. It is the visionary who knows that the power of creativity is aligned with authenticity.
You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
The visionary starts with a clean sheet of paper, and re-imagines the world.
The visionary who is serving God ceases to live for personal ambitions, but rather for God's ambitions.
To be realistic today is to be visionary. To be realistic is to be starry-eyed.
Don't be an interpreter of reality, be a visionary. Don't think about it, see it!
A visionary thrives in all circumstances.
Visionary builds what dreamers imagined.
You don't need vision to be a visionary.
